extends java.lang.Object

Mode for embedded transactions.

Since:
2.8
See Also:
IDataTransaction.newEmbeddedTransaction(de.tif.jacob.core.data.IDataTransaction.EmbeddedTransactionMode)

Field Summary
static IDataTransaction.EmbeddedTransactionMode APPEND
          Using this mode actions of an embedded transaction will be committed after its counterparts in the parent transaction.
static IDataTransaction.EmbeddedTransactionMode PREPEND
          Using this mode actions of an embedded transaction will be committed before its counterparts in the parent transaction.
